parameters: \c[1]??? \c[0]We saw the cake, Fangfang liked it very much.
\c[1]??? \c[0]Your father-in-law said that Fangfang's classmates are coming. Please prepare a nice dinner.
\c[1]??? \c[0]Don't forget to pick up something at the restaurant. Remember to get some fish. Yu and Fangfang love to eat fish.
\c[1]??? \c[0]One more thing, this morning I noticed that Fangfang left the house key
\c[1]??? \c[0]She's so forgetful even at such a young age. What if she left the key outside,
\c[1]??? \c[0]Children learn everything from adults, so you have to set an example.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Perhaps that has something to do with the color of the word \c[1]“奠(funeral)” \c[0].

\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]The time of the crime was September 15th, why is the calendar
showing a date that is seven days after that?
There's a note on the wall.
Please enter the number. (Use \c[1]↑↓←→ \c[0]keys to select numbers)
\c[1]??? \c[0]Hey, today is Fangfang's birthday, don't forget to get the cake before you head home.
\c[1]??? \c[0]The \c[1]order slip \c[0]for the cake was in some clothes' pocket and got washed.

\c[1]??? \c[0]Now there's only half a piece of paper left \c[1]in the washing machine\c[0],
and my lower back hurts, I can't get it out.
\c[1]??? \c[0]The other half might be \c[1]inside the pocket of the clothes that are being hung up\c[0].
\c[1]??? \c[0]Remember to check the pockets before putting clothes in the washing machine next time.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]It sounds like a middle-aged woman by the voice...
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]The clothes should be hung outside.
The other side is silent, only a rustling sound is heard.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]You remember my voice even though we've only met once?
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I was busy, so I didn't hear the phone ringing. \c[1]The call just now\c[0],
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]It wasn't me...\. \.I didn't see who made the call either.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]That's weird, this number belongs to the Tian family.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Am I experiencing that supernatural stuff the news mentioned before?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I know about that news. Has anyone else in town received a call like that?
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I heard people in town say that on \c[1]the 7th day\c[0] after they died,
a few of the granddaughter's classmates received strange phone calls.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]That day was also the granddaughter's birthday.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I also heard that on the sixth day after they died, a cake shop in the city received an order,
and the cake was for the granddaughter.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Now the people in town are terrified of going near the Tian's house. They're afraid of coming across evil spirits.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Officer, I'm curious about what you're doing in the Tian's house?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]There's something about the Tian family case that I wish to find out, so I went to investigate.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Dr. Ye, did Zhao Xiaojuan go to your clinic before the incident?
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Yes, it's flu season, so the clinic was pretty busy that day
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Did the Tians usually go to you when they were sick?
An extremely subtle chuckle came through the phone.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I understand what you can't figure out.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]You've probably heard about that incident between me and the Tian family.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Indeed, the Tians would rather take a longer route for another doctor than come to me after that incident.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I was also pretty surprised that Zhao Xiaojuan suddenly came to the clinic that day.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]She said her mother-in-law had a bad cough, and asked me if I had a certain brand of cough medicine.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Then she left after buying the medicine.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Got it, thank you for your cooperation.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]No problem, I can't help you much with this case. Do you want to continue the investigation?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]If there's anything suspicious with this case, I can't pretend that I don't see it.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]To be honest, when I asked whether you smoke in the clinic just now,
you said no and that you haven't investigated a case.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I thought you were a rookie.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]It's really impressive that you manage to obtain these clues in such a short period of time.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I'd like to know how you found these clues.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Unfortunately, I have business to attend to now. I hope to chat with you more if I get the chance.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I won't bother you anymore. Bye, Officer.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Ye Jingshan was in the clinic while the crime was happening, and he has his patients as witnesses. He's not really that suspicious...
Ye Jingshan seems to be consciously or unconsciously revealing strange rumors about the Tian family.
He was also very interested in my investigation of the case.
When I answered the phone, he recognized my voice right away...
It's like he's lurking in a corner nearby and watching everything.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]There should be places that haven't been investigated.
The door can no longer be opened.
A red umbrella dripping with water.
A red umbrella dripping with water.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]This is Fangfang's house. I want to see if there are any clues here.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]You said the case was closed. My presence at the crime scene won't bother you, right?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Ms. Chen, I've read the reports on the case. The autopsy report shows that Zhao Xiaojuan had committed suicide.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]And the news said that Zhao Xiaojuan hung herself after her family members died.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]If I come home to see my family poisoned and not breathing...
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I will still call for an ambulance straight away.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]You don't understand, after Fangfang's father passed away,
Fangfang was Zhao Xiaojuan's only mental support.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]After the incident, everyone thought Zhao Xiaojuan lost her mind,
but I know she didn't, she was very sane.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui\c[0]Looking at her daughter's dead body...Could you imagine how devastating that would be?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]So you think someone poisoned Fangfang's family?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]And Zhao Xiaojuan came home and saw Fangfang's body,
so she mentally broke down and killed herself?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I can't make a conclusion without finding more clues.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]What clues are you looking for?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I want to know why you went to the clinic.
Does Dr. Ye have anything to do with this case?
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Ye Jingshan had a strong motive for murder.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Two years ago, Fangfang's father \c[1]Tian Yu\c[0] had an epileptic seizure
and was sent to Ye Jingshan's clinic for emergency treatment...
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Fangfang's grandfather Tian Xiangrong believed that Ye Jingshan killed his son.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]He led a group of people to smash Dr. Ye's clinic and broke his ribs.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Ye Jingshan ended up confined to a hospital bed for more than half a month.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]He also lost a lot of money to the Tian family before everything was settled.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Moreover, Zhao Xiaojuan had gone to the clinic before the incident.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Don't you think it’s too much of a coincidence?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Dr. Ye said Zhao Xiaojuan went to the clinic for cough medicine. There were other patients who witness the incident at that time.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Who knows if there was anything wrong with the medicine he gave her, dead people can't talk.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]So you went to the clinic to find evidence of Dr. Ye's crime.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]But Ye Jingshan is a smart man, he left no clues.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Then what have you found here?
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]I have to investigate somewhere else. I will take my leave if you don't need anything else.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Ms. Chen looks a little strange...
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Is it because she found something here?
